info.name: Firefox - Windows Ribbon Theme
info.description: Themes firefox to better fit in with Windows 8 desktop apps that use a Ribbon UI, such as Explorer
info.additionalInfo: Works best with: - Personal Titlebar - FXOpera theme - The Fox, Only Better Changelog: v1.4 - Major rewrite of how private tabs look, for a more integrated look. v1.0 - Initial public version
